CustomField.description: If a link should show in the banner, enter that here. The link will be included in the Alert Message by including text in between two # marks. E.g. ‘This is my banner. Go to #URL#.’ #URL# will be replaced by a link navigating to what is in this Alert Message URL field, what is in between the # marks will be the shortened text the user sees as the link.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: See description of field for instructions
CustomField.label: Alert Message URL
